item.description:
We're all going to the dogs!

Time for a few beers and a little speculation on your favorite pooch.

6.00pm - Meet at "The Landing" open air bar on Long Wharf (Aquarium T) in Boston for a swift pint.
6.45pm - Blue line to Wonderland. The track is across the parking lot from the station.
7.30pm - First race live (plus 'simucasts' of races around the US shown live on TVs).

If you can't make it to the Landing - come along anytime at Wonderland and call my cell to find us.
We'll be in the stands or in the "First Turn" pub inside the ground.

Dress is very casual....

Cheers, Steve O.
978-289-2364

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: We're going to the dogs - Wonderland Greyhound Park
